snippet: Steven Soderbergh is an executive producer of this Starz series, which has the same title as his 2009 film but gives a new slant to its subject: high-end prostitution.
lead_paragraph: Steven Soderbergh is an executive producer of this Starz series, which has the same title as his 2009 film but gives a new slant to its subject: high-end prostitution.

headline.main: ‘The Girlfriend Experience’: Don’t Call It a Remake
headline.print_headline: Television; Working Her Way Through School
